SELECT t1.id AS id, t1.name AS name , t3.target_id AS targetId, t3.course_id AS courseId, t3.weight AS weight, t3.assess_id as assessId, ( SELECT name FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t3.target_id = t2.id ) AS targetName, ( SELECT name FROM archive_course t4 WHERE t3.course_id = t4.id ) AS courseName, ( SELECT grade FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t3.target_id = t2.id ) AS grade, t3.weight_explain AS weightExplain, t1.creator, t1.version, t1.updater FROM archive_assess t1 LEFT JOIN archive_weight_target_assess t3 ON t1.id = t3.assess_id WHERE t1.deleted = 0
and name like concat('%',#{query.name},'%')
and ( SELECT grade FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t3.target_id = t2.id) = #{query.grade}
and ( SELECT name FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t3.target_id = t2.id ) like concat('%',#{query.targetName},'%')
and ( SELECT name FROM archive_course t4 WHERE t3.course_id = t4.id ) like concat('%',#{query.courseName},'%')
order by grade desc, targetName asc, courseName asc
